item.title: Google like unit conversion on the console
item.description: For those of you who are horrid at math like I am googles unit conversion is a great help. Want to know how many GB 1Mbps is in a month? Simple just ask google. Well I like to have the ability even when I am not online and I found units. Its in the debian repository and oh so easy to use.

item.title: Use bc for command line math
item.description: BC is a great math library. Its extremely flexible and can be easily used in scripts.
